questions.oldquestion: What is the outstanding balance of your current mortgage?
questions.newquestion: How much do you have left to pay on your mortgage?
questions.hinttext: This includes any interest. You can usually find this amount on your most recent mortgage statement or by checking your online account.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: When you took out your current mortgage - how much did you initially borrow?
questions.newquestion: How much did you borrow when you first took out your mortgage?
questions.hinttext: You can find this amount on your offer letter or mortgage agreement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: Which figure represents the initial amount borrowed on one of your mortgages?
questions.newquestion: How much did you borrow when you first took out one of your mortgages?
questions.hinttext: Think about any mortgages you've taken out over the last 3 years. You can find this amount on any of your offer letters or mortgage agreements.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much is your contracted monthly mortgage payment
questions.newquestion: How much is your monthly mortgage payment?
questions.hinttext: Think about the amount you agreed to pay back every month. You can find this on your original mortgage agreement or your most recent mortgage statement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: What is the balance of your buy to let mortgage
questions.newquestion: How much do you have left to pay on your buy-to-let mortgage?
questions.hinttext: This includes any interest. You can find this amount on your most recent mortgage statement or by checking your online account.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much was your buy to let mortgage for
questions.newquestion: How much did you borrow when you first took out your buy-to-let mortgage?
questions.hinttext: You can find this amount on your offer letter or mortgage agreement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much was one of your buy to let mortgages
questions.newquestion: How much did you borrow when you first took out one of your buy-to-let mortgages?
questions.hinttext: Think about any buy-to-let mortgages you've taken out over the last 3 years. You can find this amount on any of your offer letters or mortgage agreements.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much is your contracted monthly buy to let mortgage payment
questions.newquestion: How much is your monthly buy-to-let mortgage payment?
questions.hinttext: Think about the amount you agreed to pay back every month. You can find this on your original mortgage agreement or your most recent mortgage statement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: In which month and year did you open your loan
questions.newquestion: When did you take out a loan?
questions.hinttext: Think about a personal loan you've taken out but not paid back yet. This does not include hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans or student loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: In which year did you open your loan
questions.newquestion: When did you take out a loan?
questions.hinttext: Think about a personal loan you've taken out but not paid back yet. This does not include hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans or student loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: In which month and year did you open one of your loans
questions.newquestion: When did you take out one of your loans?
questions.hinttext: Think about any personal loans you've taken out but not paid back yet. This does not include hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans or student loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: In which year did you open one of your loans
questions.newquestion: When did you take out one of your loans?
questions.hinttext: Think about any personal loans you've taken out but not paid back yet. This does not include hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans or student loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: What is the balance including interest of your loan
questions.newquestion: How much of your loan do you have left to pay back?
questions.hinttext: Think about how much of your personal loan you have to pay back including any interest. This does not include hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans or student loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much was your recent loan for
questions.newquestion: How much did you borrow when you recently took out a loan?
questions.hinttext: Think about a personal loan that you've taken out in the last 3 years but not paid back yet. This does not include hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans or student loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much was one of your recent loans for
questions.newquestion: How much did you borrow when you recently took out one of your loans?
questions.hinttext: Think about any personal loans that you've taken out in the last 3 years but not paid back yet. This does not include hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans or student loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much is your monthly loan payment
questions.newquestion: How much of your loan do you pay back every month?
questions.hinttext:
Think about the amount you agreed to pay back every month on a personal loan. This does not include hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans or student loans.

You can find this amount on your loan agreement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: Who is your home credit with
questions.newquestion: Who have you borrowed home credit from?
questions.hinttext: Home credit (also known as 'doorstep lending') is when you borrow money from a lender who comes to your house.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: Name one of your home credit providers
questions.newquestion: Which of these lenders have you borrowed home credit from?
questions.hinttext: Home credit is also known as 'doorstep lending'. Think about any of the times you borrowed money from a lender who came to your house.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: In which month and year did you open your current account
questions.newquestion: When did you open your current account?
questions.hinttext: Think about your current account only. This does not include any joint, business or saving accounts you might have.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: In which month and year did you open one of your current accounts
questions.newquestion: When did you open one of your current accounts?
questions.hinttext: Think about when you opened one of your current accounts instead of any joint, business or saving accounts you might have.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: What is the credit limit on your credit card
questions.newquestion: What's the credit limit on your credit card?
questions.hinttext: This is the maximum amount you can spend on your credit card. You can find your credit limit on your credit card statement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: What is the credit limit on one of your credit cards
questions.newquestion: What's the credit limit on one of your credit cards?
questions.hinttext: Think about the maximum amount you can spend on any of your credit cards. You can find this on your credit card statement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much did you pay off your credit card, as shown on your most recent statement?
questions.newquestion: How much was your most recent credit card repayment?
questions.hinttext: Look at the amount on your most recent credit card statement, even if you've made another payment since then. This will usually be in the account summary near the top of the statement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: What was the total value of cash withdrawn on your last credit card statement
questions.newquestion: How much cash have you recently withdrawn with your credit card?
questions.hinttext: You can find this out by looking at the total amount of 'cash advances' on your most recent credit card statement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How many cash withdrawals were there on your last credit card statement
questions.newquestion: How many times have you recently used your credit card to withdraw cash?
questions.hinttext: You can find this out by looking for 'cash advances' on your most recent credit card statement.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: In which month and year did you open your mobile phone contract
questions.newquestion: When did you take out your mobile phone contract?
questions.hinttext: Think about when you took out your personal phone contract instead of your work phone, if you have one.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: In which month and year did you open your mobile phone/telephone
questions.newquestion: When did you take out your mobile or home phone contract?
questions.hinttext: Think about when you took out your personal phone contract instead of your work phone, if you have one.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: Who was your previous mortgage with
questions.newquestion: Who did you borrow your previous mortgage from?
questions.hinttext: Think about a mortgage you've paid back in the last 2 years.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: Who was your previous loan provider?
questions.newquestion: Who did you borrow your last loan from?
questions.hinttext: Think about a personal loan you've paid back in the last 2 years. Hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans and student loans do not count as personal loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: With which company have you recently applied for a loan
questions.newquestion: Who did you recently apply for a loan from?
questions.hinttext: Think about any applications for personal loans you've made in the last 6 months. Hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans and student loans do not count as personal loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much was a recent loan that you applied for
questions.newquestion: How much did you ask to borrow when you recently applied for a loan?
questions.hinttext: Think about any applications for personal loans you've made in the last 6 months. Hire purchase agreements, second mortgages, home credit loans and student loans do not count as personal loans.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: With which company have you recently applied for a mortgage with
questions.newquestion: Who did you recently apply for a mortgage from?
questions.hinttext: Think about any applications you've made in the last 6 months.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much did you request on your last mortgage application
questions.newquestion: How much did you ask to borrow when you recently applied for a mortgage?
questions.hinttext: Think about any applications you've made in the last 6 months.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much is your monthly or most recent gas bill?
questions.newquestion: How much was your last gas bill?
questions.hinttext: Look at your most recent gas bill or think about the amount you usually pay each month.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY

questions.oldquestion: How much do you pay to your student loan each month
questions.newquestion: How much of your student loan did you pay back last month?
questions.hinttext: You can find this on your payslip.
questions.option5: NONE OF THE ABOVE / DOES NOT APPLY
